dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryDSAzureCSV
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		custId as string,
		CustName as string,
		itemName as string,
		quantity as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['emp_pq_aggr.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UserQueryDSAzureCSV

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES 
WHERE TABLE_TYPE ='BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo'

Declare @empTotal int
execute spGetEmpCountByGender 'Male', @empTotal output
select @empTotal as empTotal

sources.name: DS_Azure_CSV_Emp
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_Azure_CSV_Emp

sources.name: DS_Azure_CSV_Emp
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_Azure_CSV_Emp

sources.name: DS_Azure_CSV_Dept
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_Azure_CSV_Dept

scriptLines: query: 'select max(id) as maxId from employee',
disjoint: false) ~> splitondeptno@(dept10, dept20, dept30, otherdepts)
Address as (state as string, country as string, zipcode as string),
Contact as (Phone as string, email as string)
contact as (mobile as string, landline as string)
sourceempdata1, sourceempdata2, sourceempdata3 union(byName: true)~> unionempdata
sourceemp, sourcedept assert(expectTrue(!isNull(toDate(hiredate, 'yyyyMMdd')), false, 'assertdoj', null, 'checking date of join'),
expectExists(sourceemp@deptno == sourcedept@deptno, false, 'assertdeptno', null, 'valid from dept table')) ~> assertemp

transformations.name: join1
transformations.description: Inner join on dbo.emp and dbo.dept
